title: KadenAI Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the KadenAI adapter

video.description: An object defining additional KadenAI video parameters

width.description: Width of the screen resolution to decide orientation

height.description: Height of the screen resolution to decide orientation

skipdelay.description: The time to spend before revealing skip button

skadn_supported.description: A bool config to determine if SKADN is supported by KadenAI

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by KadenAI
